rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Wide entrance hall with Vastu aligned placement for positive energy.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area connected to kitchen and dining space, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the Mediterranean style facade.

rooms.description: Dining space that integrates with the living room, following Vastu principles for social gatherings.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen designed with modern Mediterranean elements and ample storage, ensuring proper ventilation and light.

rooms.name: swimming_pool_area
rooms.description: Outdoor area housing a swimming pool with surrounding deck; design respects plot boundaries and building norms.
